sentences.en: A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin o f little minds.
sentences.cn: 愚蠢的始终如一是渺小心灵的妖怪.

sentences.en: A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds ( Ralph Waldo Emerson )
sentences.cn: 令人讨厌的小人物身上愚蠢的一致性 ( 拉尔夫沃尔多埃默森 )

sentences.en: A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds.
sentences.cn: 令人讨厌的小人物身上有着愚蠢的一致性.

sentences.en: No hobgoblin appeared, although a black cat did try to cross my path.
sentences.cn: 没有妖怪出现，只有一只黑猫企图横穿马路。

sentences.en: The hobgoblin becomes the child, and the child becomes a hobgoblin.
sentences.cn: 换生灵变成了小孩, 小孩变成了换生灵.

trans.tran_cn: （民间传说中的）淘气的小妖精，鬼怪，妖怪，令人恐怖的事物
